#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int fastio()
{
    int x=0;
    char c;
    c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return x;
}

int main()
{
    int n,i=1,sum=0,one=0,powers[100001];
    n=fastio();
    //cin>>n;
    powers[0]=1;
    while(powers[i-1]<n)
    {
        powers[i]=(int)(pow(2,i));
        i++;
    }
    i--;
    while(i>=0)
    {
        if(n-powers[i]==0)
        {
            one++;
            break;
        }
        else if(n-powers[i]>0)
        {n-=powers[i];one++;
    }
    i--;
}
cout<<one<<endl;
return 0;
}
